packages.name: SublimeHOL
packages.description: SublimeHOL - A HOL Development Environment built on top of slimmed down, heavily modified versions of SublimeREPL (https://github.com/wuub/SublimeREPL), SublimeANSI (https://github.com/aziz/SublimeANSI), and SML-syntax (https://github.com/Takaia/SML-syntax) hackily put together.
